divs: sighting details-time date nov 28th 10:30pm 1. eastbound of highway 40 towards st. louis city from west county. *(names deleted--cms\sg) (my brother and his gf who are sitting here telling me this as i type it up) were listening to music and driving along the highway. *(name deleted--cms\sg) got a sudden urge to look out the window in the sky. they first thought it could've been a plane or helicopter but it was just really strange and too bright. it was on the north side of the highway about a half mile up the road from st. johns hospital. they noticed it shortly after they passed over highway 270. they were going about 60mph. they noticed the ufo about a mile or so ahead. not sure what it was exactly yet. they kept watching as it wasn't moving. it had between 7-10 lights towards the top of it, red and white, bright. the red flashing about every 5 seconds. the white ones stayed on. the whole bottom of it was black and shaped like a classic style ufo\ the ufo was hovering above the treeline, it was a few inches above the treeline from their point of view from the highway. it was stationary, not moving. looked to be about a half a mile away. it hovered there for what they guessed was about a minute, they were watching it as they passed by it, and it slowly lowered into the trees. fairly slowly. they were in shock and awe at seeing this. they lost sight as it lowered to the trees. they called me right after and i got to hear how freaked out\excited they were. they get sick and tired of me talking about ufos, so for them to be saying this is pretty legit. also i asked them what else they thought it could've been. they didn't say it was like anything. it could be a crazy lighted helicopter.. but yeah... also they couldnt hear any sound. let me know if you need any more info. they're trying to draw it
Summary: disc with dome lights all around the top
